org.trimou.engine.cache

Interface ComputingCache<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - The key
    V - The value

    public interface ComputingCache<K,V>
    A simple abstraction for computing (lazy loading) cache. It may not contain null values. An implementation must be thread-safe.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    Martin Kouba

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ComputingCache.Function<K,V> 
      static interface  ComputingCache.KeyPredicate<K> 
      static interface  ComputingCache.Listener<K>

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void clear()
      Clear the cache.
      V get(K key) 
      Map<K,V> getAllPresent() 
      V getIfPresent(K key) 
      void invalidate(ComputingCache.KeyPredicate<K> keyPredicate)
      Invalidate all entries whose keys satisfy a predicate.
      long size()
      The expired entries may be also counted, but will never be visible to other read/write operations.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        V get(K key)
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        a value for a key, computing the value if necessary

      • getIfPresent

        V getIfPresent(K key)
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        a value for a key or null if no such value exists

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clear the cache.

      • size

        long size()
        The expired entries may be also counted, but will never be visible to other read/write operations.
        Returns:
        the number of cached entries

      • invalidate

        void invalidate(ComputingCache.KeyPredicate<K> keyPredicate)
        Invalidate all entries whose keys satisfy a predicate.
        Parameters:
        keyPredicate -

      • getAllPresent

        Map<K,V> getAllPresent()
        Returns:
        an immutable map of the values which are present in the cache at the time this method is called
